sqlQuery.name: AllCommunityDatasets
sqlQuery.sql: select user_dataset_id as dataset_id from @VDI_CONTROL_SCHEMA@.AvailableUserDatasets where is_public = 1 and project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@'

sqlQuery.name: All
sqlQuery.sql: select user_dataset_id as dataset_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project, name, name as hyperlinkName, description, summary, from VDI_CONTROL_@VDI_SCHEMA_SUFFIX@ where is_public = 1
